settings.name: skipUnmarkedChecks
settings.desc: If true, all checks only run if they are explicitly enabled. Otherwise, most checks (those that are not disabled by default) run unless they are explicitly disabled.

settings.name: adapterClassNameRegex
settings.desc: Regular expression for adapter class names, to exempt from Program to Interface, Not Implementation and Adapter Pattern checks (default is "Adapter$").

settings.name: convAllowEmptyPackage
settings.desc: Whether to allow empty package names, i.e. "". Defaults to false.

settings.name: convMaxLength
settings.desc: Maximum length. Default is no max.

settings.name: maxMethodLengthInstrs
settings.desc: Maximum method length, in bytecode instructions.

settings.name: maxNumParameters
settings.desc: Maximum number of parameters per method.

settings.name: domainPackageName
settings.desc: Name of the domain package (default is "domain").

settings.name: allowedDependencies
settings.desc: List of user-specified allowed dependencies (add known interfaces and/or data classes here).

settings.name: coupMaxInDegree
settings.desc: Specifies the maximum In-Degree for a class. Default is no max.

settings.name: coupMaxOutDegree
settings.desc: Specifies the maximum Out-Degree for a class. Default is no max.

settings.name: coupIgnorePackage
settings.desc: Specifies a package to ignore in a check (for example, ignore the presentation layer).

settings.name: coupCycles
settings.desc: Specifies whether to check for cycles. Defaults to true.

settings.name: coupIgnoreSelfCycles
settings.desc: Specifies whether Classes that reference themselves will be reported (cycles like A â†’ A). Defaults to true.

settings.name: obsInterface
settings.desc: Specifies whether to check for interface subjects. Defaults to true.

settings.name: obsAbstract
settings.desc: Specifies whether to check for abstract class subjects. Defaults to true.

settings.name: obsConcrete
settings.desc: Specifies whether to check for patterns with only a concrete subject, and no abstract subject.

settings.name: allowMarkerInterfaces
settings.desc: If true, interfaces with no fields nor methods ("marker interfaces") will be ignored. (Defaults to false.)

settings.name: .pumlOutputPath
settings.desc: Specifies the path for the output .puml file. Defaults to pumlGen.puml (in the root of the directory).

settings.name: .svgOutputPath
settings.desc: Specifies the path for the output .svg file. Defaults to svgGen.puml (in the root of the directory).
